roleset.name: rapid gait of horse, wherein each foot strikes separately

roles.note: Only verbal examples with arg0: "I trotted, slow gait and racked the horse, both ways."

example.name: horse arg1
example.text: They're judged by how the rack of the horse has been developed.

roleset.note: Roleset based on WordNet eventive noun entries. No corresponding verb entry or VN entry, no FrameNet. Framed by Claire.
